text.section:
In making the appointments required under subsection (a)(1) of this section, the Governor shall appoint members from among:
the geographic regions of the State; and
diverse backgrounds.
A majority of the members shall be individuals with disabilities.

section.section: The term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of the members are staggered as required by the terms provided for the members of the Commission on October 1, 2007.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member may not serve more than two consecutive 3-year terms.

text.section: A member who fails to attend at least 50% of the regularly scheduled meetings of the Commission during any 12-month period shall be considered to have resigned.
